reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one mentioning it was a huge hit at their pageant, and they appreciate its amazing fit and good quality fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: I bought this dress for my brother’s event, and it was perfect! The dress was very comfortable to wear and looked really cute. The fabric felt nice and breathable, which made it easy to move around in all night. It’s definitely a great value for the price. I’m very happy with this purchase and would recommend it! Read more
items.author: Sheelandiana almeus

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Vibrant color, exceptional quality, made to fit. This mermaid sequin dress is exceptional.
items.body: This is a beautiful dress that looks and fits exactly as shown in the image. I bought this to go with my Poison Ivy costume, but it is so beautiful I plan to use it at future black tie functions as well. The fit: While I picked a standard size based on their sizing chart, the seller contacted me directly for my measurements. The dress fit perfectly when it arrived. Hands down the best quality materials were used in this dress. Color: Exactly as shown. The rich emerald green is soooo fabulous. It looked perfect with my Poison Ivy costume, but it also looks lovely against my normal brown hair and fair skin tone. I think this is an exceptional dress that I will use in years to come. I will come back to this seller for future dresses as well. This isn't one of those "internet fail" dresses that you see TikTok's about. I love this dress! *Please disregard the ivy in the picture with my dress - I used removable tape to attach it* Read more
items.author: Shane Cutting

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful & Well Made Wedding Reception Dress
items.body: I changed into this dress for my wedding reception and I highly recommend it for anyone considering. I can’t find a full picture of myself on the dress because we were living in the. One t and loving and grooving, but the measurements I sent in were perfect and it fit me like a glove with no additional alterations necessary. It was comfortable and sexy. 10 out of 10 would recommend for any bride or brides on a budget. Read more
items.author: Caity Cait

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect dress for cruise!!
items.body: This dress was great for my cruise!!! I did have to size up in order to fit my hips but none the less it fit perfectly!!!! I loved the corset back! For reference I am 5’6” 165 lbs Read more
items.author: Evelyn

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A side zipper would help but overall LOVED the dress!
items.body: The seller will reach out to you shortly after purchase to get your measurements. The dress fit perfectly. I 100% loved the dress but I gave 4 stars because I had to take it to a seamstress to have a side zipper installed for ease of putting on/taking off. I needed the dress for a solo trip and was unable to do the corset ties in the back on my own (there’s like 20 laces). The dress fit so well that it could only be tied up once you’re completely in it, meaning someone else has to tie it up for you. If you have someone to do that for you then this won’t be an issue for you. Adding a side zipper was an easy fix. I also had my seamstress tack down the flowing part to the front and back so it wouldn’t fly in the wind and show anything since the split is very high. Good quality fabric as well. Good purchase! I highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Whitney

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant dress
items.body: This dress is absolutely beautiful! I had plan to return it because it was very long. Instead I took it to a seamstress and got it fixed. I’m 5’7 and it was very long on me even with my heels on. The only inconvenience is that I had to get it fixed. The dress fits beautiful and the material is great. I would suggest if you’re 5’7 or less don’t buy the dress unless you wear really tall heels. Read more
items.author: Juanita Jerez

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I wore this dress to a sneaker ball. It fit perfect. Only issue, the split was too high and angled to show my butt cheek. Only adjustment I made was pin the train over it and the dress came out perfect. Didn’t take much pics that day. This is the best I can give. Read more
items.author: Viannie Torres

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Make sure you get two sizes up when purchasing this item
items.body: This dress runs very small. You need to get two sizes up when you buy it. Read more
items.author: Johnson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Evening Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dusty Sage, Fuchsia, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Peacock, Plum, Blush Pink, Lavender, Royal Blue, Mauve, Teal, Turquoise. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
